headline: 250 miles. One weekend.
philosophy: The same persistence that gets you through mile 200 is what gets you through debugging at 2am. Ultrarunning taught me that the impossible just takes longer.

races.name: Cocodona 250
races.location: Black Canyon City â†’ Flagstaff, AZ
races.description: One of the most challenging 250-mile races in the world. 250 miles through the Arizona desert, climbing from 2,000 ft to over 9,000 ft, finishing in Flagstaff.

races.name: Javelina Jundred
races.description: A classic desert 100-miler through the Sonoran Desert. Fast course, hot conditions, incredible community.
